snippet: Chad’s president confirmed the death of the toughest and most ruthless of the Al Qaeda commanders in the region.
abstract: French military strikes at Islamist militants dug in along remote, rocky mountain ranges of northern Mali, killing scores; operations are conducted with Chadian troops, and are further sign that French military intervention in Mali is not winding down soon.

byline.original: By ADAM NOSSITER and MAÏA de la BAUME
byline.contributor: Adam Nossiter reported from Dakar, Senegal, and Maïa de la Baume from Paris. Martin Zoutane contributed reporting from Ndjamena, Chad.

lead_paragraph: Chad’s president confirmed the death of the toughest and most ruthless of the Al Qaeda commanders in the region.

headline.seo: French Forces Strike Militants in Mountains of Mali
headline.main: French and Chad Forces Strike Militants in the Mountains of Mali
headline.print_headline: French and Chad Forces Strike Militants in the Mountains of Mali

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations
